text: Bozzi is an Italian surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Emilio Bozzi, Italian businessman * Giovanni Bozzi, Belgian basketball coach * Giuseppe Maria Bozzi, Italian priest * Julie Bozzi, American artist * León Bozzi, Argentinian former sports shooter * Marie-Jeanne Bozzi, French politician and criminal * Mike Bozzi, American engineer * Paolo Bozzi, Italian psychologist ==See also== * Libreria Bozzi, Genoa, oldest bookshop in Italy
title: Bozzi
